item.description:
Well, if you haven’t heard about Vision Boards yet, it is time to learn about this fun tool for your daily inspiration! Creating a Vision Board is getting more and more popular as it is a helpful visionary exercise for achieving your desired outcomes in life.

- Why is it time?

The first reason is the year is coming to an end, and making a vision board is a kind of peeking into the new year, making the first step toward a better future by visualizing pictures of the new you, or new relationships, new job, new house and new....

or maybe not the new, but the old good you yet with some re-freshed, re-newed details 

The second reason for putting things together on your Vision Board is THE SHIFT everybody is talking about.

We are stepping into the year of 2013, and from various sources and media you can hear about Earth changes, and Humanity stepping into a new era where a new, enlightened society will evolve. The shift in people’s consciousness is happening right now, and this has to be acted upon individually and collectively.

So, I invite you to celebrate this exciting time by creating inspiring Vision Boards!

“The secret of getting ahead is getting started.” - Mark Twain

Please come toMy Vision Board Workshop!

When:

Friday. November 16th, 2012 @ 6:30pm

Price: $10.00

All materials will be provided!! (pictures, cardboard, glue sticks, markers, crayons, colored pencils, ribbons, stickers and even sparkles! plus tea for a good mood )

But you can still bring your own pictures or magazines to cut your favorite pictures out, along with your most loved photos or stickers.


My Action Board Workshop - Friday. January 18th, 2013 @ 6:30pm.

“Vision without action is a dream.

Action without vision is simply passing the time.

Action with Vision is making a positive difference.” - Joel Barker
item.name: My Vision Board Workshop
